Class ViewEventFragment

Fragment
com.example.fusion0.fragments.ViewEventFragment
public class ViewEventFragment extends Fragment
Author:
Simon Haile This activity allows organizers to view the selected joined event and users that have scanned a qr code to view the scanned event

    • onActivityResult

      public void onActivityResult(int requestCode, int resultCode, Intent data)
      Checks results after coming back from another activity
      Parameters:
      requestCode - see if the activity we came back from was correct
      resultCode - whether the activity finished correctly
      data - the data obtained from the activity
